title: PBE didnt update?
body: So ive seen videos of lissandra update on youtube and its not on my pbe client, even after it updated today?

replies.body: As of PBE 7.7, we don't have a Lissandra update. We might be exploring some possible changes to her in the future, so keep checking the PBE patch notes so you can be sure when those changes happen!

Thanks but even so my PBE client never tells me when the new patch updates are there! It always says the currents patch which now is 7.6. I tried reinstalling and closing it and opening it etc. and still the same thing.

Ah! So when you log into the PBE client the patcher never tries to download the latest patch. If that's the case, your network might be having a hard time connecting to our PBE patching server specifically. Go over the steps in our [**Connection Guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to see if we can patch that up and get you back to testing!
